creditline: Gift of Lora and Martin Weinstein
description: black and white photograph with collage-like layout; overlapping postcards, brochures and ephemera; ambiguous background that could be abstract painting or textured surface; banner of French text across top; four post cards/ prints layered over the textured background; post card in LLC shows negative image of face peering behind twisted wooden shape with text in upper right and lower left; LRC postcard black with two abstract shapes in center; French script along bottom quadrant; post card in URC printed in negative of rubble/ undetermined imagery; postcard in ULC printed in negative of young girl, head in scarf; Asian characters across top
signed: LRC in pencil: Composition de Jean-Pierre Sudre [illeg.] | ULC in pencil: Cartier Bresson_ Hiroshima
title: Cartier Bresson_Hiroshima
